tool_description: Get publicly accessible data from Kickstarter.com with our Scraper API. Get information such as Search Results, Project Information, and URL extraction.
name: Kickstarter
title: Kickstarter

Use this endpoint for when you need highly custom filters.

required_parameters.description:
Search Results URL.
Use this endpoint for when you need highly custom filters.

api_list.description: Get Search Results by Keyword and other filters.
